name: Mirror Moved
description:
Controls:

WASD or Up Down Left Right to move around

Gameplay:

Each character must navigate to grab their matching key. Once all keys are collected, they all have to open their matching chest at the same time to advance to the next level.

The characters movements are Joined Together. The red character moves intuitively. The green has inverted horizontal movements. The purple has inverted vertical movements. The yellow has both inverted.

Align two characters in matching gates to swap rooms. Only one character can be in a room at a time.
